name: Crohnam

skills.name: Djinn Swords
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of increasing the duration of a random debuff on the target by 1 turn. If Djamarsa is on the same team, each hit also increases the duration of any HP Burn debuffs on the target by 1 turn.

effects.notes: Double hit. Each hit can extend debuffs and HP Burn (with Djamarsa).

skills.notes: Synergy with Djamarsa for HP Burn extension.

skills.name: Berserker’s Delight
skills.description: Attacks 3 times at random. Each hit has an 80% chance of instantly activating any HP Burn debuffs on each target. Heals this Champion by 10% of their MAX HP for each HP Burn debuff activated by this skill.

effects.notes: Triple hit. Each hit can activate HP Burn and heal.

skills.notes: Activates HP Burn, strong healing if many burns.

skills.name: Blazing Zephyr
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has an 80% chance of placing a HP Burn debuff for 2 turns. Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 15% for each HP Burn debuff placed by this skill.

effects.notes: AoE. 80% chance to place HP Burn and fill TM per HP Burn placed.

skills.notes: TM fill scales with number of HP Burns placed.

skills.name: Simmering Anger
skills.description: [Passive Effect] Every 10 times Active Skills are used in battle by either enemy or allied Champions, this Champion instantly activates the Berserker’s Delight skill. This happens every 5 times Active Skills are used if Djamarsa is on the same team. [Active Effect] If Djamarsa is on the same team, revives this Champion with 50% HP and 50% Turn Meter when killed.

effects.notes: If Djamarsa is on the same team, revives this Champion with 50% HP and 50% Turn Meter when killed.
Fills Turn Meter by 50% on revive (with Djamarsa).

skills.notes: Unique HP Burn cycling and revive synergy with Djamarsa.

forms.aura: Increases Ally ACC in all Battles by 50.
forms.comments: Referral reward champion. Excels in HP Burn activation, especially with Djamarsa. Top-tier for Hydra, Spider, and some Doom Tower bosses.

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Generally good AI, but may not always prioritize HP Burn activation optimally.

cheese_strategy.cheese_type: HP Burn cycling and revive with Djamarsa
cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Can solo Sand Devil and other bosses with Djamarsa passive revive.

mechanics_advisory: Crohnam is a top-tier HP Burn activator and excels in content where HP Burn is meta. Synergizes best with Djamarsa for revive and faster cycling.
